dt-option.description:
The information element can be used to convey information about the current state of the table. Although the internationalisation options presented by DataTables are quite capable of dealing with most customisations, there may be times where you wish to customise the string further. This callback allows you to do exactly that.

		Please note that if the `dt-init info` option id disable in the initialisation, this callback function is not fired.
dt-option.name: infoCallback

example.title: Show start to end indexes in the information element
Use the API in the callback to show page count

parameter.content: Starting position in data for the draw
parameter.name: start

parameter.content: End position in data for the draw
parameter.name: end

parameter.content: Total number of rows in the table (regardless of filtering)
parameter.name: max

parameter.content: Total number of rows in the data set, after filtering
parameter.name: total

parameter.content: The string that DataTables has formatted using its own rules
parameter.name: pre

returns.content: The string to be displayed in the information element.

type.signature: infoCallback( settings, start, end, max, total, pre )
